column4: Hi, after i install beryl (which works just fine if I run `beryl` from cmdline), I don't see the beryl loader- or an icon which I can use to launch it- should I just make one or is it provided with beryl-manager?
should be in system tools. the manager does it, though
see, thats the thing- when I run manager, there's no systray icon for beryl.
odd. there /should/ be one. look it up with synaptic and confirm you have all the pieces. can't think of why else that wouldn't show up
